data.message: Love Facebook and how far you have come with it just have one question why am I not able to get on this day app on my phone

replies.message: Hi Debra. You can visit facebook.com/onthisday to see all of your memories you have shared for the current day since you've been on Facebook. We hope this helps! -Kevin
